title: Have you ever played a ranked game...
body:
And you didn't know it was ranked? You just thought you clicked normal and you want to relax and not play seriously at all. You end up doing so well    
and at the end game screen you see (+23) lp, then you realize... I wish the ranked and normal draft labels were switched on my client so I don't have to worry so much about making mistakes and losing so I can win lol.
